CustomFieldTranslation.help:
Following replacement will be made in the Topic - {0} -> Company Name {1} -> Division {2} -> Title
E.g. "Card Exchange: {1}, {0}" will be editied to "Card Exchange: Development, SunBridge Inc." when the new card contains "SunBridge Inc." as the company name and "Development" as the division.
CustomFieldTranslation.name: SmartViscaf__FeedOnNameCardTopic__c
